ilog.cplex

Interface IloCplex.RemoteInfoHandler

  • Enclosing class:
    IloCplex

    public static interface IloCplex.RemoteInfoHandler
    Interface for handlers for messages from remote workers.

    You can derive your own class from this class and implement a handler which processes info messages sent by a remote worker. Use the method IloCplex.setRemoteInfoHandler(ilog.cplex.IloCplex.RemoteInfoHandler) to install instances of this interface in an instance of IloCplex. Likewise, use the method IloCplex.removeRemoteInfoHandler() to uninstall such instances.

    See Also:
    IloCplex.setRemoteInfoHandler(ilog.cplex.IloCplex.RemoteInfoHandler), IloCplex.getRemoteInfoHandler(), IloCplex.removeRemoteInfoHandler()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void main(java.lang.Class type, int tag, java.lang.Object data)
      Processes an info message.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        void main(java.lang.Class type,
        int tag,
        java.lang.Object data)
        Processes an info message.

        This member function is invoked whenever an info message arrives from a remote worker.

        Parameters:
        type - The type of data in data. This is always the class of the wrapper for a primitive type, such as Integer.class. The data is an array of the respective primitive types. For example, if type is Integer then data is int[].
        tag - The tag that the remote worker set for this message.
        data - The raw message data. This argument is either null or an array of the type specfied by type.
